There is no better summer activity then learning LaTeX! LaTeX is great for writing elegant and clean documents. It is a “high-quality typesetting system” designed for technical and scientific writing. If you’ve ever read a great looking article with beautiful equations and tables, it was probably written in LaTeX.

Join us for this Introduction to LaTeX session on Thursday, July 28 from 1:00-3:00 in STO 442. Bring your CV! We’ll be demonstrating how to write a CV in LaTeX.
